item.title: Ron add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "I do not think much of a man who is not wiser today than he was yesterday." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Ron add a quote by Philip Dormer Stanhope
item.description: "Idleness is only the refuge of weak minds, and the holiday of fools." -- Philip Dormer Stanhope

item.title: Ron add a quote by Jim Elliot
item.description: "He is no fool who gives what he cannot keep to gain that which he cannot lose." -- Jim Elliot

item.title: Ron add a quote by Apple Computer Inc.
item.description: "Here's to the crazy ones. The misfits. The rebels. The troublemakers. The round pegs in the square holes. The ones who see things differently. They're not fond of rules. And they have no respect for the status quo. You can quote them, disagree with them, glorify or vilify them. About the only thing you can't do is ignore them. Because they change things. They push the human race forward. And while some may see them as the crazy ones, we see genius. Because the people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do." -- Apple Computer Inc.

item.title: Ron add a quote by Peter F. Drucker
item.description: "There is nothing so useless as doing efficiently that which should not be done at all." -- Peter F. Drucker
